title: About
text:
This site contains several graphs analyzing hockey data. These graphs are about, the amount of each type of shot that resulted in a goal, the position of the player on the outcome of the shot, and the year drafted into the NHL on a players total goals.
Github:
https://github.com/huner1212/Hockey-Shot-Overview
Email:
Hockeyhunter21@gmail.com
Course Homepage:
https://bootcamp.davidkane.info/

title: Hockey Data Analysis
text: In the sport of Hockey there are a multitude of different factors that drastically change the outcome of a shot. The goal of this overview was to analyze Hockey shots/goals to understand the impact of the various factors surrounding them such as the position the player plays or what type of shot they took. I pulled data containing the 2010-2018 regular seasons from Kaggle and manipulated it to be able to better show the effect of these factors on the outcome of a shot. After seeing these graphs I hope that it will be able to better demonstrate how different factors can have a major impact on the outcome of each shot.
